item.description:
We are thrilled to have as our guest speaker Heidi Solomon, Certified Professional OrganizerÂ® and the founder of POSH - Professional Organizing Services by Heidi.

Heidi will explain how she tackles organizing for her clients. She will help us find one manageable project, create a plan, determine what (if any) organization or storage tools are required, execute on the plan and create a maintenance program.

Come with a specific area you'd like to tackle in mind. If you can, bring photos of your challenge area. Check out Heidi's fabulous website: POSH website. Heidi was recently featured on Ch. 7's Room for Improvement, POSH tackled two teenage boys rooms and transforms them from chaos to calm.

The meeting is Tuesday, October 28th at 7 PM
Location: Trinty Church Meeting Room, 11 Homer Street, Newton Centre
Hope to see you there!

Marilyn
About this Meetup Group

group.name: Tools for Decluttering, Personal Change & Goal Attainment

item.name: Tips and Tricks from a PROFESSIONAL Organizer!
